text: Kamen Rider OOO is a 2010-2011 Japanese tokusatsu drama in Toei Company's Kamen Rider Series. ==Schedule== Super Hero Time aired alongside Tensou Sentai Goseiger and then Kaizoku Sentai Gokaiger. ==Cast== * Eiji Hino / Kamen Rider OOO: Shu Watanabe * Ankh, Shingo Izumi: Ryōsuke Miura * Hina Izumi / Kamen Rider OOO: Riho Takada * Shintaro Goto / Kamen Rider Birth: Asaya Kimijima * Akira Date / Kamen Rider Birth X: Hiroaki Iwanaga * Erika Satonaka: Mayuko Arisue * Chiyoko Shiraishi / Kamen Rider Birth: Marie Kai * Kousei Kougami: Takeshi Ukaji * Kiyoto Maki: Yuu Kamio * Kazari: Yūsuke Yamada * Uva: Taito Hashimoto * Gamel: Hiroyuki Matsumoto * Mezool (Human State): Honoka Yahagi * Ankh (Lost) (Human State): Hikari Tobita * O-Scanner Voice, Medagabryu Voice: Akira Kushida * Narration, Birth Driver Voice, Birth Buster Voice: Jōji Nakata ===Guest cast=== * Masaru Hashimoto (17, 18): Mitsuomi Takahashi * Kengo Utahoshi (48): Ryuki Takahashi * Yuki Jojima (48): Fumika Shimizu ===The Shogun and the 21 Core Medals cast=== * Gentaro Kisaragi: Sota Fukushi * Yuki Jojima: Fumika Shimizu ===Movie War Mega Max cast=== * Michal Minato / Kamen Rider Aqua: Atsushi Arai ==Songs== ; Opening themes * "Anything Goes" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition: Tatsuo (of everset and Galveston 19) ** Arrangement: Tatsuo & Kōtarō Nakagawa ** Artist: Maki Ohguro * "Anything Goes! OOO 10th Mix" ** Artist: Maki Ohguro * "Anything Goes! Happy 10th ver." ** Artist: Eiji Hino x Ankh x Hina Izumi (Shu Watanabe, Ryōsuke Miura, & Riho Takada) ; Insert themes * "Regret nothing ~Tighten Up~" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: Shuhei Naruse ** Artist: Eiji Hino (Shu Watanabe) ** Episodes: 5, 7, 13 * "Got to keep it real" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: Shuhei Naruse ** Artist: Eiji Hino (Shu Watanabe) ** Episodes: 6, 16, Movie War Core * "Ride on Right time" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: Shuhei Naruse ** Artist: Eiji Hino (Shu Watanabe) ** Episodes: 9, 10, 15, 40, 42, 45 * "Sun goes up" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: Shuhei Naruse ** Artist: Eiji Hino (Shu Watanabe) ** Episodes: 12 * "Time judged all" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: Shuhei Naruse ** Artist: Eiji Hino x Ankh (Shu Watanabe & Ryōsuke Miura) ** Episodes: 20, 22, 23, 25, 28, 48 * "Shoot out" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: Shuhei Naruse ** Artist: Eiji Hino (Shu Watanabe) * "POWER to TEARER" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: Shuhei Naruse ** Artist: Eiji Hino (Shu Watanabe) & Akira Kushida ** Episodes: 36, 44 * "Reverse/Re:Birth" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: tatsuo (everset) ** Artist: Akira Date & Shintaro Goto (Hiroaki Iwanaga & Asaya Kimijima) ** Episodes: 38, 46, 47 ; Other * "Let's Go!! Rider Kick" ** Lyrics: Shotaro Ishinomori ** Composition & Arrangement: Shunsuke Kikuchi ** Artist: Kōichi Fuji ** Episodes: 27 * "WIND WAVE" ** Lyrics: Tsuyoshi ** Composition: Ayano ** Artist: Tsuyoshi & Ayano ** Episodes: 35 Category:Japanese science fiction television series Category:2010 television series debuts Category:2011 television series endings
title: Kamen Rider OOO
